result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Johnnie Lee Jones

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Johnnie Lee Jones appeared by video.  Attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal appeared by video for Johnnie Lee Jones.  Prosecuting attorney Katrina Voge appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Hearing held via Zoom.  Pretrial conference held.  Atty. Gary Edward Rosenthal has not received discovery and has not had any contact with his client and needs additional time to review. Case adjourned to Br. 1.
Status conference scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 10-17-2022, filed.  rmm
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Dunham's Sporting Goods; Zaccheus X. P. (DOB, 11.24.1995)
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.

Defendant Johnnie Lee Jones appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke appeared by video for Johnnie Lee Jones. Attorney Arthur Kenneth Thexton appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 1. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. This hearing may be streamed live at the Court's discretion on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/83289ee0-2326-3076-b9a3-4c551cf64527
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
